TopicTitle: Will you skip school/work on 27 April?

Articles.Content: Is KSP going to v1.0 that big a deal for you that you'd miss work/school for it?
Nope...i want to but i cant afford it- i could get kicked out of school 3 weeks before graduation...but i will have the 29th to play it all day as i have a big test on the next day
I will just be fanboying and going hyper all day at school. Yep. Nothing awkward here.

Although my fondness for KSP is great, I would never let it get in the way of my academics.

EDIT: I am soooooo glad that my finals will be done before the 27th!
Nope, national holiday here in The Netherlands ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I think i can rein myself in for couple of days ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) 1 of May i will start a long overdue two week holidays - my laptop will get a serious workout ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I used to schedule vacation for big game releases. Not so much anymore.
I've been with KSP since 2011, I think waiting a bit longer is not really an issue.
I've got finals a week after release...

I've only skipped school for being sick and nothing else. Seriously, It can wait until I get home or when I have free time.

Also you guys are lucky, I still have another month before finals!
It releases a week before AP exams. There won't be much time for KSP until they finish...
Nice try, boss.

Nope! I have 27th/28th off!
If I did my mom would cut off my ass and hang it on the wall.

Im shall move to the netherlands now
Updates are typicality released about 1 hour before or after I get home from school, so no reason to skip.

Unfortunately, I don't think my parents will fancy the idea of me skipping a whole day of school just for 1.0, even though the occasion is totally worth it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
I'm gonna be honest I'm a grown man with things to do and I'm not completely sure if Im gonna skip that day for a video game or not haha
Sadly I have booked a vacation starting the day that 1.0 is released.... Terrible luck! Tempted to cancel but I think others might hurt me if i did. ha ha ha ha

Yeah, I'm totally going to neglect my family on the 27th.

I have a two week break starting monday but I'm going to be on an island with a tiny laptop... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I dont want to ruin 1.0 by playing it on a machine that is not ideal so I think I will wait a week till I get back before I jump in.

It will also mean that I wont have to deal with the mad rush to download it.

...

Oh who am I kidding, I'm totaly gonna play it on my laptop

Much as I'd like to write off next Monday (and all subsequent Mondays) Murphy's Law says that if I did, KSP wouldn't get released until the very end of the day. I work from home so I can always take a "break" if it does come out during the day.
I don't have too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
